ComicInfo.Penciller: Curt Swan,Ed Robbins,Neal Adams,Werner Roth,Eddie Robbins,Eddie Robbins,Curt Swan,Werner Roth
ComicInfo.Summary:
Diary of a Madman: Maude falls in love with Amos Featherston, but he refuses to marry her because of his insane brother.
Abracadabra -- You're Dead!: Mandro exhibits fake occult artifacts as the real thing, yet for some reason after each time he cons the public into believing him, he suddenly ages overnight.
The Day Nobody Died!: Hans manages to capture Death, preventing anyone in the area from dying.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,Dave Wood,D. W. Holtz,Carl Wessler,Dave Wood,D. W. Holtz
ComicInfo.Title: Diary of a Madman; Abracadabra -- You're Dead!; The Day Nobody Died!
